meaning: She manifests in the form of languages.
commentary: Earlier in ‘मतृका-वर्ण-रूपिनी (‘Matṛkā-varṇa-rūpinī) (nama 577) it was explained that all the aksharas (alphabets) are Her forms and that She wears these alphabets around her neck. Language has its origin in aksharas and hence it is apt to say that every language is Her form.
